name: COME TO YOUR SENSES (Psychedelia, mavlac)
description:
The winner of the Game Developers Session Game Jam 2019 BIG Challenge (Theme: Meaningful decisions).

Travel through the neural network, collect stimuli from all your five senses, avoid colorful distracting thoughts and make a decision at the end!

Bear with us, we will upload more builds and make the page prettier when GDS2019 ends :)

Teaser video

If you'd like to give us feedback or just say hi, contact us at:
